attributes.additional_details: I and many UK citizens are fed up of the UK starting to become a lawless state, we need to stand up for our values and stick by them so we can make Great Britain Great Again!
attributes.background:
I and many UK Citizens would like all illegal immigrants deported immediately and for the Royal Navy & Armed Forces to protect our borders, once this is in place it would be massive saving for the government.

Kind Regards Andrew McGookin

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action: 

Shut the migrant hotels down now and deport illegal migrants housed there
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/718406

Deploy the Royal Navy to help stop illegal immigrants entering the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701998

Deport all immigrants that arrive illegally from safe countries
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703195
